nodes.text: Several stilt villages built and inhabited by Ewoks existed on the Endor Moon, some of which were located on Lake Sui. They consisted of cone-shaped buildings built upon stilt-assemblies, and were connected to land via a series of bridges. The Ewoks who inhabited such villages also navigated the lake on small sailboats.
Ewok stilt villages made their canonical debut in the 2015 video game Star Wars Battlefront. They were inspired by a piece of concept art by Ralph McQuarrie.
